title: [Ilynov Manor, Entrance Hall]
description: Two enormous bay windows, complete with cushioned seats, stand on either side of a pair of tall mahogany doors.  Cream wallpaper with thin, vertical crimson stripes is complemented by blonde oak wainscoting.  Two large, cut crystal chandeliers cast a warm glow over the flooring, which is of silver-veined onyx marble and centered with a pure white marble crest of House Vaalor.  Along the western wall, a winding staircase with a polished cherrywood banister curves upward toward the library, while a shadowed alcove along the eastern wall houses a set of carpeted steps leading downward.
location: Ilynov Manor, inside the elven fortress of Ta'Vaalor
